        public final void turnListener(Turn turn,
                Player player,
                Npc npc)
        The turnListener check the actual TYPE Id and starts playerTurn() or npcTurn().
        Parameters:
        turn - the actual turn from the BootCycle.
        player - the player
        npc - the npc
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the actual TYPE is null or unknown.
